summary: This is a simple modification of some of the buy-able modules in Breezehome
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=5]This mod is NOT compatible with Hearthfire!
Don't ask me to make it compatible, it won't happen as Bethesda broke breezehomes NavMesh beyond repair with that DLC...[/size][/color]

PLEASE DO NOT FORGET TO ENDORSE...
(only about 1/10 of the downloaders endorsed it...)

It seems to be easier for now to download manually and add the file to NMM, ad the server seerms to be overloaded a lot lately...

NOTE: This is a simple modification of some of the buy-able modules
in Breezehome

DESCRIPTION:

-Alterations to the Alchemy package:

The alchemy room has been altered to a smithing room
including a tanning rack, anvil, grindstone and a workbench.
There is also a non respawning barrel for your ingots.
The bookshelf and the chest have not been moved, as you still need
some place to store those weapons you forged and the books with the
different smithing techniques;)

The Alchemy table has been located to the right when you enter
Breezehome (where the never used shelf was).
I have added some potions and a non respawning
The enchanting table is located to the left (where the never used
table was) I have added a non respawning satchel there also.

-Alteration to the Dining room package:

Under the stairs I have cleaned stuff up and added a chest
Removed the big table, replaced it with a small table for your
romantic dinners with Lydia.

-Alterations to Lydia's room:

Upgraded the furniture

-Alterations to the Master Bedroom:

Upgraded furniture, added a safe and a lock-box.

- Navmesh altered to the new layout

********************************************************************
INSTALLATION:

1. use NMM and activate
2. manually put the .esp file into your data folder

UNINSTAL:

1. use NMM and dis-activate
2. manually remove the .esp file from your data folder

********************************************************************

Disclaimer:

- This is my first project, made for myself,
- I thought I should share it with the community that gave me so much to enjoy
- This mod was tested in Vanilla Skyrim without any bugs
- This mod should be compatible with all texture mods.
- I have tested it with Sexy Whiterun, Alternatives Whiterun,
and the Skyrim HD 2K textures mods without bugs.
- I do not use the HD pack from Bethesda, as there are beter packs
to be used made by very good modders...

Should you stumble upon bugs, you can contact me on the Nexus
and on TES Alliance, I use the nick DarkSoul1977 on both sites.

********************************************************************

LICENSE:


This mod will be uploaded by me after testing to the Following sites:

SkyrimNexus and TES Alliance

Steam workshop

You are allowed to use the changes to your own project under
following conditions:

- just ask me first and give me 5 days to respond
- give me credit

If you do not fulfil both conditions, and you use these changes,
you are hereby agreeing to supply me with a daily supply of
52 fresh, SELF-MADE American cookies with chocolate chips.
To be delivered daily at my doorstep at 10.00 am.
This is at our own expense and for life.

********************************************************************

Thanks to:
- Bethesda for making Skyrim
- DarkRider for his wonderfull modding Tutorial on TESA
- 1355970 for making me start modding

DO NOT FORGET TO ENDORSE...
author: DarkSoul1977
